translation.en: -[siren wailing in distance] -[news theme music playing]
[man] And it looks like gangs are in.
-[overlapping chatter continues] -[siren wailing faintly]
-[man] ...fifteen-year-old boy... -[woman on phone] Hello?
translation.ko: - 15살 소년이... - 여보세요? - 새로운 기록이... - 투자 한 번으로 크게...

translation.en: [man] ...increase in funding, police intervention has failed
translation.ko: - 공직자의 부패가... - 크게 증가하여... 노스탤직 사는 결국 가격을 대폭 인하하기로...

translation.en: to provoke a significant reduction in crime statistics.
translation.ko: 노스탤직 사는 결국 가격을 대폭 인하하기로... 60년대부터 증가하는 요소가 아니라...

translation.en: [man] ...invasive culture of violence. -[overlapping chatter continues] -[automated voice] Please try again.
Tom.
-Tom, what's happening? -You all right, Danny?
Yo, don't say I never do nothing for ya.
translation.ko: 내가 너한테 뭐 안 해줬다는 소리하지 마

translation.en: Oh, sweet.
-Who's that? -I didn't say it weren't secondhand.
translation.ko: - 이건 누구야? - 중고가 아니라고 하진 않았지

translation.en: [woman] This morning, we're gonna go over your revision sheets
and take a look at exam prep.
If we don't hit the 60 percent pass rate,
we're gonna be spending a lot more time together in queue at the job center.
translation.ko: 직업 안내 센터에서 오랫동안 발품을 팔게 되겠지 톰, 연습 문제 답은 뭐지?

translation.en: So, Tom, how did you get on with the exercises?
Tom.
-Triangles? -[students] What? Okay, Eileen, what about you?
translation.ko: - 삼각형인가요? - 뭐? 그럼 아일린, 네가 말해 봐

translation.en: Yeah, it was all right. One thing I didn't under...
Man, it's painful watching you sometimes.
-What? -This.
Everyone knows you've fancied Lucy Walker since forever.
translation.ko: 다들 네가 오래전부터 루시 워커를 좋아한다는 걸 알아

translation.en: Just man up and get it done, all right?
Ooh, here she comes. This could be your big chance to impress her.
translation.ko: 마침 이리 온다 좋은 인상을 줄 절호의 기회야

translation.en: So, make sure you say something really, really cool.
translation.ko: 아주 멋지게 한 마디 날려야 해

translation.en: -Go away, please. -Tom.
-Hey. -Uh, did you get the science revision?
-Yeah. -No, I mean, like, did you get it?
-Oh, did I get it? Yeah, I think so. -Cool.
Look at Tommy boy. He's getting moist just talking to a girl.
translation.ko: 우리 톰은 여자애랑 얘기만 해도 다리에 힘이 풀리는구나

translation.en: -Still a dickhead, Eugene? -What are you looking at?
translation.ko: - 유진, 넌 여전히 머저리구나 - 뭘 쳐다봐?

translation.en: Fuck off.
So, anyway, um, the science revision.
I, uh, was wondering if you could help me 'cause I tried looking at it,
translation.ko: 네가 좀 도와줬으면 해서 혼자 공부하려고 했는데

translation.en: and then I remembered I haven't paid attention in science since, like, 2011.
translation.ko: 2011년부터 과학 시간에 집중해서 들은 적이 없거든

translation.en: [chuckles] I'll see what I can do.
I mean, I can only work with what I got. You're not exactly a model student.
translation.ko: 아는 만큼만 도와줄 수 있지만 너도 모범생은 아니니까

translation.en: -Are you questioning my academic prowess? -I am, yeah.
translation.ko: - 내 공부 머리를 의심하는 거야? - 실은 그래

translation.en: All right, well, I'm seeing Charlie after school, but come by later, yeah?
translation.ko: 좋아, 난 학교 끝나고 찰리를 만나기로 했는데 - 나중에 들를래? - 그럴게

translation.en: Sure.
-Charlie Gibbs or Charlie Penford? -Uh, Charlie Gibbs. As in Charlotte?
translation.ko: - 찰리 깁스, 아니면 찰리 펜포드? - 찰리 깁스, 여자애 말이야

translation.en: I haven't seen Charlie Penford in months.
translation.ko: 찰리 펜포드는 안 본 지 오래됐어

translation.en: Right, of course. I mean, it's none of my business, obviously.
translation.ko: 그렇구나, 어차피 내가 참견할 일도 아니지만

translation.en: I'll see you later then.
See you, Lucy, later-- See you later, Lucy.
[man on TV] Put here some vegetable stock--
[man 2] Police investigation con--
What are you so fidgety about?
If someone said for you to come around later,
what time would you say that was?
-Later than what? -Than earlier.
Like, eight, do you think, maybe?
Well, that's certainly later on than earlier.
-What you writing? -A romance novel.
-They're all romance novels. -Yes, they are.
Would you like to hear some?
I don't think so.
-"Philip..." -Oh, Nan.
"...closed the door behind him and undid the buttons of his shirt.
He unbuckled his belt and released his engorged--"
Oh, Jesus. I'm going.
Lucy?
-[Lucy breathing heavily] -[man] Let's go, man.
-[Lucy sobbing] -[man speaking indistinctly]
Hey! Stop!
[woman] Emergency. Which service?
Nan?
This is your phone.
Did it miss all the important bits? Well, it's a brain,
so we tend to think of all of it as quite important.
translation.ko: 전체가 아주 중요하다고 볼 수 있지

translation.en: -But it will be okay? -We hope so.
Fragments here and here missed the temporal lobe
translation.ko: 여기와 여기에 박힌 파편이 측두엽을 비켜나서 다행히 청각에는...

translation.en: and the auditory complex by milli--
Is my friend in here?
Lucy's gone home, love. She was discharged about a week ago.
You've been out for nearly ten days, Tom.
translation.ko: 넌 열흘 가까이 의식을 잃고 있었단다

translation.en: At the moment,
nothing in there is moving around in any way that worries us.
translation.ko: 지금은 다행히 뇌 속의 파편이 움직이지 않고 있어 정말 운이 좋았지

translation.en: -You were very lucky. -Will there be, like, side effects?
translation.ko: 움직이지 않고 있어 정말 운이 좋았지 - 부작용 같은 게 있을까요? - 계속 지켜보겠지만

translation.en: We're gonna keep an eye on you, but if anything unusual happens,
translation.ko: - 부작용 같은 게 있을까요? - 계속 지켜보겠지만 특이한 증상이 느껴지면 내게 바로 알려줘야 한다

translation.en: I want you to let me know straightaway.
translation.ko: 특이한 증상이 느껴지면 내게 바로 알려줘야 한다

translation.en: -Unusual, like, how? -Just unusual.
I should've done something. You did the only thing you could, love.
translation.ko: - 제가 뭔가 했어야 했어요 - 네가 할 수 있는 일을 했잖아

translation.en: -Have you seen her? -No.
It'll take a while, Tom.
Is there something about my grandson you find particularly fascinating?
-No, no, no. -Well, stop bloody staring at him, then.
Looks like he's been in the wars.
Well, thank you for your considered medical opinion.
Maybe, next time, I'll get the doctor to drive us and you to do the operation.
translation.ko: 다음에는 운전은 의사에게 맡기고 수술은 당신에게 부탁해야겠네요

translation.en: -How about that? -Calm down, love.
translation.ko: 수술은 당신에게 부탁해야겠네요 화내지 마세요 그냥 제가 보기에 그렇다고요

translation.en: It's only an observation.
translation.ko: 화내지 마세요 그냥 제가 보기에 그렇다고요

translation.en: So, how you feeling?
-How's the head? -It's all right.
-How's it look? -Already, it looks better.
We need to even this up a bit.
You know, if you feel up to it, maybe later you should go to Lucy.
translation.ko: 몸 상태가 괜찮으면 나중에 루시를 보러 가렴

translation.en: -No, she's not gonna want to see me. -Of course, she is.
I ran away, Nan.
Anyone could be forgiven for running out of that flat, Tom.
translation.ko: 그런 상황에서 달아난 건 용서받을 만해

translation.en: But someone who kept running afterwards when she really needed them?
translation.ko: 하지만 그 후로 그 애가 널 필요로 할 때 달아나면 안 되지

translation.en: That would be a coward.
[girl] I mean, what a fucking asshole. Who says that?
I mean, come on. He said he was gonna call me.
Then, when I saw him, he said he was out of credit.
-I know. He's on a contract. -[electronic pulsation]
[girl] Yeah, I know for a fact he's definitely on a contract.
-Right? -Yeah. Oh, my God, what a prick.
Now, some boy is staring at me.
-Oh, shit, it's that kid they shot. -How's he look?
translation.ko: - 저런, 그 총 맞은 애네 - 상태는 어때?

translation.en: Not good. [chuckles]
-What floor you want? -Five.
Nice flowers. For your nan?
Oh, you look like shit.
Say hello to Lucy from us, yeah?
Let me go and check on her first, all right?
You all right, Ben?
You all right, Tom?
[man on TV] Lamela. Back to Walker.
[woman] She's in her room, Tom.
I'm glad you're not dead.
Thanks.
Same.
They've given you lots of drugs?
Yeah, must've done. Things have been a bit trippy.
-I'm sorry, Luce. -It's okay.
No, it's... it's not.
They won't get away with it.
They already have.
I should've done something.
-Yeah? Like what? -I shouldn't have run.
translation.ko: - 뭘 해야 했는데? - 달아나지 말았어야 했어

translation.en: No one's mad at you for not being a hero.
translation.ko: 네가 영웅이 아니라고 해서 화낼 사람은 없어

translation.en: Tom?
-Tom? -I'm fine, Nan.
You're frightening me.
-I'm gonna call the doctor. -I'm fine, seriously.
I just need to get some sleep.
-There he is. -[chuckles] Morning.
-You sleep all right, love? -Yeah, good.
All right. Well, you look better. How was Lucy yesterday?
Different.
Yeah. So were you.
Keep thinking if your mum was still with us,
she'd be out there now, kicking doors down,
translation.ko: 너한테 그런 짓을 한 놈들을 찾으러

translation.en: trying to find the little bastards that did that to you.
Tom!
-What are you doing? -It's Monday.
You've just been shot in the head.
I think they'll give you a bit of time off school.
It's exams... or doom.
Well, stay out of trouble. [sighs]
Tom.
Shit. You took a head shot and you're already walking.
translation.ko: - 살살 해 - 맙소사 머리에 총을 맞았는데 벌써 걸어 다니네

translation.en: Is it true they had to pull bits of phone outta your brain?
translation.ko: 머리에 총을 맞았는데 벌써 걸어 다니네 머리에 전화기 파편이 박혀 빼냈다면서?

translation.en: -Left most of it in there, I think. -Mate, I am... -I am glad you ain't a vegetable. -[chuckles]
translation.ko: - 대부분 남아 있을걸 - 식물인간이 되지 않아 다행이다

translation.en: -Thanks, Danny. -Wait, I know you're not going to school.
translation.ko: - 고마워, 대니 - 아직 학교에 가면 안 되잖아

translation.en: -I thought I might. -Head trauma is wasted on you, mate.
translation.ko: - 가도 될 것 같은데 - 머리 외상이 문제가 아니구나

translation.en: Danny, can I ask you something?
I don't know anything about it. No one on the estate does.
translation.ko: 난 그 사건에 관해 아무것도 몰라 동네 사람들도 다 모른다고

translation.en: Yeah, but--
Bruv, just forget about it now and move on.
-[vehicle horn honking] -I think Eugene was there. Eugene? Come on, man.
translation.ko: - 유진이 거기 있었던 것 같아 - 유진이라고?

translation.en: The guy wants to be a bad boy, but he's got a line, you know?
translation.ko: 그 녀석은 깡패처럼 굴어도 연줄이 있다고

translation.en: -Yeah, but what if he was? What do I do? -Look, he wasn't there.
translation.ko: - 하지만 정말 걔였으면 어쩌지? - 유진은 그 자리에 없었어

translation.en: That's all there is to it. Come on.
-Tom? Tom! -Huh?
Did you hear what I said? Party tonight.
translation.ko: 내 말 들었어? 오늘 파티가 있다고

translation.en: -Oh. Hadn't heard about it. -Yeah, he might not have invited you.
translation.ko: - 못 들었어 - 하긴 넌 초대받지 않았겠구나

translation.en: Everyone still thinks you're in a coma now.
translation.ko: 다들 네가 아직 혼수상태인 줄 아니까

translation.en: -Right. -But you should come.
-What? You're not going to school? -They've done all they can for me, son.
translation.ko: - 너 학교 안 가? - 배울 건 다 배웠어

translation.en: -But I'll see you there, yeah? -In a bit.
No!
-Ah, fuck. -[students laughing]
-[woman] Eugene, put that away now. -[Eugene] Shut up, man!
translation.ko: - 유진, 전화기 치워 - 다들 신경 꺼

translation.en: Excuse me, everyone. Quiet down.
-It's funny, innit? -[woman] Eugene.
You know what else is funny? I know where you live, you little--
translation.ko: 또 뭐가 웃긴지 알아? 네가 어디 사는지 다 아는데...

translation.en: -Bruv, you made it. -Yeah.
How you feeling? How's your head?
What the fuck you staring at, Tom?
What you staring at, Tom?
-What the fuck are you--? -All right, Eugene.
-Chill out, bruv. Hey, just chill out. -Get him out of here now.
translation.ko: - 진정해, 이러면 안 되지 - 저 자식 쫓아내

translation.en: -Relax. Chill out. -Take him back to Nanny, bruv.
translation.ko: - 머리 좀 식혀 - 저놈 할머니한테 보내버려

translation.en: -I'll sort it. Just chill. -Yeah, yeah, yeah, sort it, Danny.
translation.ko: - 진정해, 내가 알아서 할게 - 너도 꺼져, 대니

translation.en: What's the matter with you?
Do you want another hole in your head?
You start a fight in there, you ain't gonna win it.
They were there.
-What you talking about? -At Lucy's.
translation.ko: - 무슨 소리야? - 루시네 집에 있던 놈들이라고

translation.en: When are you gonna get it through your head that this wasn't them?
[scoffs] You talk like you're not one of them.
translation.ko: 얘들은 상관없다니까 언제쯤에나 이해할래? 넌 한패가 아닌 것처럼 얘기하네

translation.en: I know they've already got you selling. What, you think this won't escalate?
translation.ko: 놈들에게 매수당한 것 다 알아 점점 더 심해지지 않을 것 같아?

translation.en: Don't be a dickhead about it, Tom.
I'm doing what I want.
You get that? You know what? One day, it'll be me at the top giving out orders,
translation.ko: 알겠어? 언젠가 내가 우두머리가 되어서 명령을 내릴 거야

translation.en: and it won't be none of this shit, just business.
Tom, I can't always be there, you know.
translation.ko: 톰, 내가 항상 도와줄 순 없어

translation.en: -You smell like weed. -[chuckles]
You got any?
-Comes out here empty-handed. -[chuckles] Sorry.
-How was the party? -It was all right. Didn't miss much.
translation.ko: - 파티는 어땠어? - 그냥 그랬어, 별것 없었거든

translation.en: How you feeling?
Good.
Yeah?
-Yeah. -That's good.
Maybe you'll be able to come back to school soon.
translation.ko: 조만간 학교에 갈 수 있을지도 모르겠네

translation.en: -Yeah, maybe. -Boring without you there.
Got no one to throw chips at in the canteen.
-Like you'd ever dare throw chips at me. -Yeah, what would you do about it?
translation.ko: - 나한테 튀김을 던진 적 없으면서 - 던지면 어떻게 할래?

translation.en: Give you a slap, obviously.
[chuckles] You'd have to find a chair to stand on first.
You're gonna regret all this talk when I'm owning you in front of everyone.
translation.ko: 내가 애들 앞에서 따귀를 날리면 그런 말 한 걸 후회할 텐데

translation.en: Okay. I wouldn't mind that so much.
It's gonna be all right, you know.
Yeah.
Five steps to remotely hack into a DNS server. -PHP Web Shell and Stealth. -[overlapping chatter]
-Just chill out, bruv. -Naw, man. No time to chill.
translation.ko: - 신경 쓰지 마 - 어휴 - 머리나 식혀 - 식힐 새가 없어

translation.en: -What am I gonna call her for? -For me.
translation.ko: - 내가 왜 걔한테 전화해? - 날 위해서

translation.en: -[beeping] -[electronic pulsation]
-Good seeing you, Cutz. -What's going on?
[Cutz] Cool, yeah?
Half a brick there, yeah. Sure you can--?
-Why are you leaning on my car for, fam? -Cutz, man--
translation.ko: 정말로... 넌 왜 내 차에 기대어 있어?

translation.en: Get off the fucking car.
-You sure you can handle it, yeah? -Well, it's easy, man.
translation.ko: - 정말 할 수 있겠어? - 그 정도야 쉽죠

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. Should we start talking to you now?
Stand over there, fam.
He's cool. Listen. All right, Cutz. He's cool.
-Don't worry about him. -Are you sure?
Yeah, yeah. He's cool, he's cool.
-Mind how you lot go, fam. -Yeah, I'll bell you straightaway.
-Make sure you call me, yeah? -I'll bell you. Safe.
-Safe, Cutz. -Safe.
Wow, that was exactly the same time, you know?
translation.ko: 어떻게 동시에 울리냐? "알 수 없음: 네 뒤에 있다"

translation.en: What?
-I'll bell you. -Safe, Cutz.
Let's go.
-You're bugging out, bruv. -Fuck, bruv.
Weirdo.
I wondered if you wanted some tea, love.
-Tom? -Tea? Yeah, cool.
Okay.
-[gunfire] -Mom!
Who's fucking with the lights?
Hey! What the fuck--
Quiet-- Quiet, please. Shh!
Thank-- Shh! Hush! Thank you.
So, for this morning's thought of the day,
we will be discussing with you future planning.
Now, as you know, many of the top here will be, uh, taking their exams soon.
translation.ko: 졸업을 앞둔 학생들은 대부분 곧 시험을 칠 텐데

translation.en: Much sooner than many of them would like.
-[boy] Hey, yo, that's you. -[man] But it's always at this-- Shh!
translation.ko: 학생들에게는 너무 이르게 느껴지겠지만... - 항상 이맘때... - 왜 네가 나와?

translation.en: It's always at this time of year,
as we prepare to say bye-bye to some of you,
that my thoughts turn to... to what lies ahead of us on the road to...
translation.ko: 우리 앞에 펼쳐진 길이 어디로 향할지...

translation.en: Um, okay. Everybody, quiet, please.
As we-- Quiet, please!
[man] Boys, stay calm! Just sit down!
Sit! I said sit down!
Control yourselves!
Everybody, quiet!
Oh, my good God! Stop the video!
Stop the fucking video! Get them out!
translation.ko: 저 망할 놈의 비디오 끄고 학생들 내보내

translation.en: Take it down! Everybody out! Out!
Mr. Harris was just standing there
with this huge projection of Cass behind him just jerking off.
translation.ko: 선생님 뒤의 커다란 스크린에 캐스가 자위하는 모습이 나온 거야

translation.en: Everyone goes, like, crazy. Everyone's screaming and stuff.
translation.ko: 다들 날뛰고 소리 지르고 아주 난리였어

translation.en: Cass goes bright red, just, like, runs straight out of there.
It was so funny.
[chuckles] God, how did that even happen?
Don't know.
-Should we listen to some music? -Sure.
-CDs? Are you serious? -Oh, they're my mom's.
translation.ko: - CD 같은 것도 가지고 있어? - 엄마 거야

translation.en: Well, she's got interesting taste.
-What about Tongue? -Yeah.
-[soft music continues] -Do you want to go to dinner?
-Dinner? -Yeah, food or something.
-Yeah, okay. -Okay.
Great.
[man] Yeah, well, I'm sorry, but our system is a hundred percent accurate.
You've missed your payments, which total 600 pounds, so--
[Nan] Oh, oh, let's just all bow down to whatever your system says, shall we?
Can you check it again for me?
Look, if you can pay the 600 now,
then we can stop the added interest on the account,
translation.ko: 가산금이 붙지 않게 해드릴 수 있지만

translation.en: but until then, my hands are tied. Young man, I don't have 600 pounds.
translation.ko: - 내시기 전까진 어쩔 수 없어요 - 나는 600파운드가 없어요

translation.en: I don't have 300 pounds.
You have my 300 pounds, but you've lost it.
-Now, I'd like to speak to-- -Wait, hold on.
It's saying the payment's been made. The account's coming up as cleared.
-I think this might be an error. -Oh, an error?
I thought the system was a hundred percent accurate?
-Hold on a minute. -[door opens, closes]
Right.
I don't reckon I could live on a canal boat.
translation.ko: 난 배에서 살지는 못할 것 같아

translation.en: -Why not? -It's too low down.
I really like being able to see all of the city and the little people
translation.ko: 난 창문 너머로 펼쳐진 도시와 작은 사람들을 보는 걸 좋아하거든

translation.en: out my window.
Plus, ducks are weird.
-Shit, they're coming. -No!
-Quack! -Stop it! I'll kick you in.
It's actually really nice getting out of the flat for a little bit.
translation.ko: 잠시 아파트 밖으로 나오니 참 좋아

translation.en: My mum just watches me constantly.
It's like she thinks I'm gonna throw myself off the balcony or something.
translation.ko: 내가 발코니 같은 데서 뛰어내리기라도 할 줄 아시나 봐

translation.en: I've never been the victim.
It doesn't feel right.
-I don't see you like that. -Yeah, you do.
But it's all right.
You'll get there.
You know, out of everyone,
you're the only person who has come to see me.
-Luce, what happened? -Tom...
No, I... I just...
I want you to know you can...
I want you to feel safe when I'm around.
translation.ko: 내가 곁에 있을 때 안심했으면 좋겠어

translation.en: What I mean is,
translation.ko: 그러니까 만약 우리가 또 안 좋은 일에 휘말리면

translation.en: if we were in trouble again, I want you to know that I wouldn't run this time.
translation.ko: 그러니까 만약 우리가 또 안 좋은 일에 휘말리면 이번에는 내가 달아나지 않고 곁에 있을 거라고 믿어줬으면 해

translation.en: I'd stay.
translation.ko: 이번에는 내가 달아나지 않고 곁에 있을 거라고 믿어줬으면 해

translation.en: Even if it meant I'd die, I'd just...
I just want you to know that.
Okay.
Same.
Did I ever tell you about when I got locked out
on your roof overnight with, uh, what's-her-face?
translation.ko: 지붕에서 밤을 새운 얘기를 한 적 있던가?

translation.en: -No. -Alice.
Do you know Alice? She sat, like, left of you in...
translation.ko: 네 왼쪽 자리에 앉는 애 말이야

translation.en: -...math? -I think so.
We thought it'd be a really good idea to go and sit up there, and--
translation.ko: 지붕 위에 앉아서 내려다보면 멋질 거라고...

translation.en: Lucy!
-Oh, shit. -You all right?
Yeah?
Heard about what happened to you and Ben.
translation.ko: 너랑 네 오빠가 무슨 일을 당했는지 들었어

translation.en: That's messed up, you know. But they'll get what's coming to 'em.
translation.ko: 끔찍한 일이었지 하지만 그놈들도 벌을 받을 거야

translation.en: -I promise you that. -Right.
You don't think it's nothing to do with us, do ya?
-Why would I think that? -No, exactly.
'Cause, you know, since it happened,
some little prick has been playing these childish games with us.
translation.ko: 어느 멍청한 놈이 우리에게 유치한 장난질을 치고 있거든

translation.en: But you wouldn't know anything about that, would you, Luce?
No.
-'Cause I think you might-- -Leave it, Eugene.
-What about you, Tom? -What about me?
You've always had a thing for Lucy, ain't ya?
-And you're a geek. -I'm not a geek.
But you look like a geek.
You little shit, it's you, innit?
-What the fuck? -Got us all.
translation.ko: "알 수 없음: 틀렸어, 머저리들아" - 이게 뭐야? - 우리를 엿 먹였군

translation.en: Yeah.
-Fuck, man. -Where is he?
I told you, Hazzard, bruv!
Come out! Come out now!
I'm really sorry.
Thank you for today.
This is the whip, boys.
-You know how to do this one, yeah? -Of course.
translation.ko: - 차 문 딸 줄 알지? - 당연하지

translation.en: -Would sir like to take a drive? -Oh, sir would.
-Yo, start the car, Eugene, bruv. -Calm yourself down, man.
Nothing in the glove compartment, fam, not even sunglasses.
translation.ko: 글로브 박스 뒤져 봐 - 선글라스는 어디 있지? - 대시보드 안에 있겠지

translation.en: -Hey, Hazzard, check the dash, bruv. -[overlapping chatter]
translation.ko: - 선글라스는 어디 있지? - 대시보드 안에 있겠지 - 차 주인은... - 알았어

translation.en: I beg you, hurry up, bruv, or they'll be out here, man.
-[mocking] "Watch me start a Golf." -I've started better cars, man.
translation.ko: 사돈 남 말 하네 나도 노력하고 있다고 재촉하지 좀 마

translation.en: Don't rush me, don't--
translation.ko: 나도 노력하고 있다고 재촉하지 좀 마

translation.en: You've started no cars, man.
-Give me that, give me that. -[overlapping chatter]
translation.ko: - 그거 나한테 줘 - 서두르지 않으면 들키겠다

translation.en: -It's different in here, man. -[doors locking]
translation.ko: - 차 주인은 멀리 있을걸 - 특이한 차네

translation.en: [scoffs] Why you locking the door? I didn't lock the fucking door, Haz, man.
translation.ko: - 문은 왜 잠가? - 내가 안 잠갔어

translation.en: -Shut your mouth. I didn't lock the door. -Oh, you didn't lock the door?
translation.ko: - 입 닥쳐, 안 잠갔다니까 - 안 잠갔다고?

translation.en: I swear down I didn't lock the door for fucking fuck!
-I didn't lock the door! I swear to you-- -[engine starts]
-You started the engine. -I didn't fucking start that!
translation.ko: - 이젠 시동을 거는군 - 시동 안 걸었어

translation.en: -So who done it, then, bruv? -[engine revving]
-I didn't start that! -[static]
-[distorted voice] I know what you did. -What the fuck? Who is that?
translation.ko: - 너희가 무슨 짓을 했는지 알아 - 뭐라고? 이건 또 누구야?

translation.en: -Who the fuck are you? -Why are you revving up?
translation.ko: - 너 뭐하는 놈이야? - 엔진은 왜 켜?

translation.en: -Look at my legs, bruv! -Stop fucking revving the car, bruv!
translation.ko: - 엔진이 마구 돌아가잖아 - 내 다리 쪽 봐 엔진 멈춰

translation.en: Hey, yo, there's smoke coming from the car, fam!
Open the fucking door! There's smoke coming out!
-Why did you attack the Walkers? -We got told to! We had no choice!
translation.ko: - 왜 워커 일가를 습격했지? - 명령이라 어쩔 수 없었어

translation.en: Shut the fuck up, Cass, man!
Who told you to?
-Shut the fuck up, Cass! -It was the boss!
We didn't want to! We're sorry!
Cass, I ain't telling you again! Shut the fuck-- [screaming]
translation.ko: 두 번 말하지 않을 테니 닥쳐

translation.en: -Who's your boss? -[coughing]
-Cover your mouth! Cover your mouth! -Haz! Haz!
translation.ko: - 너희 두목이 누구야? - 흔들어서 깨워 - 야, 정신 차려 - 괜찮은지 살펴봐

translation.en: -Oh, shit! -Tell me his name!
translation.ko: - 미치겠네 - 이름을 말해 문짝을 박살 내버려

translation.en: Haz is gone, man! Haz! Haz!
translation.ko: 문짝을 박살 내버려 - 이러다 죽겠어 - 캐스, 일어나

translation.en: -Give me the name. -I ain't dying in no shitty Golf, bruv!
translation.ko: - 이름을 말해 - 이렇게 죽을 수 없어

translation.en: Shut the fuck up! I told you to shut up!
The name! Now!
It was Cutz! It was Cutz!
-He made us do it! -[car doors unlocking]
Yo, Keon, what you making?
What's it look like? Shepherd's pie, fam.
Yo, what's the difference between shepherd's pie and cottage pie?
translation.ko: 셰퍼즈 파이와 코티지 파이의 차이가 뭐야?

translation.en: I don't know, but I would smash your mom's cottage pie.
translation.ko: 나도 몰라, 하지만 너희 엄마의 코티지 파이를 힘껏 두들겨 주지

translation.en: -Shut up. -[men laughing]
No, it's the potatoes, innit, man?
Mashed potatoes are fluffy, like sheep. Shepherd's pie.
translation.ko: 셰퍼즈 파이에는 양처럼 폭신한 으깬 감자가 들어가지

translation.en: Cottage pies have them square potatoes, like the roof of a cottage.
translation.ko: 코티지 파이에는 오두막 지붕처럼 네모난 감자가 들어가고

translation.en: -[laughing] This guy... -Get the fuck out of here, man. -"Fluffy potatoes." -Behave.
Would you lot stop talking about fucking pies?
And if you must know, the difference is lamb.
translation.ko: 굳이 알고 싶다면, 양고기가 들어가냐 안 들어가냐 차이야

translation.en: -[static] -Yo, Cutz, ain't that your car?
translation.ko: 굳이 알고 싶다면, 양고기가 들어가냐 안 들어가냐 차이야 커츠, 저거 네 차 아니야?

translation.en: Yeah.
I think he's getting his dick out, bruv.
-Are you lot doing this? -No, bruv.
Oh, shit, he's pissing.
Motherfucking prick! Hurry up, bruv.
translation.ko: 저 망할 새끼, 어서 잡으러 가자

translation.en: Hurry up, man!
Proper fucking leather, man.
-Shut up, man. -I'm just saying, man.
Fuck.
I heard there was this guy...
...who's trying to take on the gangs, like some sort of vigilante or something.
translation.ko: 갱들을 혼내주는 사람이 있다는 소문을 들었어

translation.en: Yeah, heard that as well.
What an idiot.
Well, you know, maybe this is just the start.
Maybe he's gonna change this place for the better.
translation.ko: 이 동네를 더 나은 곳으로 만들지도 모르잖아

translation.en: What? By setting fire to cars and getting into fights?
To clean this place up, he'll have to do a lot more than that.
translation.ko: 이 동네를 깨끗하게 하려면 훨씬 더 큰 일을 해야 할 거야

translation.en: -You know the exams? -Mm-hmm.
Well, I haven't been back to school since...
translation.ko: 난 퇴원한 뒤로 학교에 계속 안 나가서...

translation.en: And I wondered if maybe you wanted to go together.
-To the exams? -Like, the world's most boring date.
translation.ko: - 시험 보러? - 세상에서 제일 지루한 날이잖아

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay.
What the fuck, man?
-You shouldn't go through my room. -You shouldn't have flick knives.
translation.ko: - 제 방을 뒤지시면 안 되죠 - 칼을 가지고 있으면 안 되지

translation.en: -How about we focus on that? -This is bullshit.
Innit just?
-Where do you go at night? -Walking.
-With this? -No.
Actually, I took it off someone else. That's one less knife on the street.
translation.ko: 실은 다른 사람 걸 뺏었어요 - 길거리에 칼을 하나 줄인 거죠 - 시민의 의무를 다했구나

translation.en: Oh. So, this is you doing your civic duty.
translation.ko: - 길거리에 칼을 하나 줄인 거죠 - 시민의 의무를 다했구나

translation.en: Maybe.
What's happened to you, Tom? You never used to get into trouble,
translation.ko: 어쩌다 이렇게 됐니, 톰? 문제를 일으킨 적 없던 애가

translation.en: and now it's all bullet wounds and knives.
translation.ko: 이제는 총을 맞지 않나 칼을 가지고 다니지 않나

translation.en: -Nan... -Well, where does it end, Tom?
I'll tell you where it ends, jail or the morgue.
translation.ko: 내가 말해주마 감옥 아니면 영안실 행이야

translation.en: I'm trying to do something, Nan. I'm trying to do something good.
[scoffs] No, you're not.
[man] Things are a little out of control, wouldn't you say, Cutz?
translation.ko: 통제할 수 없는 상황이라고밖에 말할 수 없겠군

translation.en: I-I know, boss.
Half our boys are in the cells.
Ellman, I'm gonna sort this out, believe me.
It's not about what I believe. It's about what you believe.
translation.ko: 내가 믿는 게 중요한 게 아니라 자네가 믿는 게 중요해

translation.en: Do you believe that if you don't make this right,
I'll hold you personally responsible? Yeah, of course.
translation.ko: - 내가 자네를 신뢰하리라 믿나? - 네, 물론이죠

translation.en: And do you believe that the man I hold personally responsible
won't be walking around on this Earth for very much longer?
No. No, I don't.
-Better make it right, then. -I will, Ellman, trust me.
I'm gonna sort this out as soon as possible, but--
translation.ko: 이 상황을 가능한 한 빨리 해결하고 싶지만...

translation.en: -[Ellman hangs up] -Hello?
translation.ko: 이 상황을 가능한 한 빨리 해결하고 싶지만... 여보세요?

translation.en: I've got half my boys nicked right now.
People are taking money from my account! The fucking audacity!
translation.ko: 사람들은 뻔뻔하게도 내 계좌에서 돈을 빼갔지

translation.en: I need answers today! I need every piece of technology!
translation.ko: 오늘은 범인을 잡고야 말겠어 기계란 기계는 다 가져와

translation.en: Laptops, phones, anything. You will knock on everyone's flat.
translation.ko: 한 집도 빼놓지 말고 뒤져서 노트북, 휴대전화, 전부 다

translation.en: Your own mothers, your cousin, your sister, I don't give a fuck.
translation.ko: 너희 엄마, 사촌, 동생 가리지 말고

translation.en: Understood?
-Yeah. -Yeah.
-Yes. -He said, do you understand?
-[all] Yes! -What you standing here for? Move!
Oi, Cass.
Yo, Cutz.
Big Kees. What you saying, bruv?
-What's happening? You all right? -Yeah, man. What you saying?
translation.ko: - 별일 없지? 잘 지냈냐? - 네, 무슨 일이죠?

translation.en: Nothing, man, I just wanted to ask you a little question.
translation.ko: 대단한 건 아니고 물어볼 게 있어 누가 네놈 얼굴에 이렇게 총을 들이대고

translation.en: You see, if someone put a gun to your fucking face like this here, huh?
translation.ko: 누가 네놈 얼굴에 이렇게 총을 들이대고

translation.en: And said, "Give me names,"
would you do it?
No?
Or if it was a car and it was burning?
translation.ko: 그러면 타고 있던 차에 불이 나면

translation.en: Would you do that? Would you drop my name?
translation.ko: 말할 거야? 내 이름을 댈 거냐고?

translation.en: -What about Ellman? -Of course not.
It doesn't make sense.
Eugene and-- They've been nicked.
And nothing happened to you.
-I'm confused as well. -You're confused?
translation.ko: - 저도 왜 그런지 모르겠어요 - 너도 모르겠다고?

translation.en: It's cool, man. Do your thing.
You're all right, man. You're good, man.
Knock, knock.
Take everything. I don't care if it's an old school Game Boy. You get it.
translation.ko: 다 압수해 구식 게임기도 봐줄 것 없어

translation.en: Really, bruv?
There were four lads who pushed their way in.
They looked threatening. They were tall, like that.
translation.ko: 위협적인 인상이었는데 키는 이 정도로 컸고요

translation.en: All in black, you know, hoods up and stuff and...
They was asking for everything electric.
They took my phone, took my laptop.
They took the bloody TV and all.
Went into my grandson's...
[man] I mean, I-I've never met the guy...
[man] ...like we were talking about last week, we were saying...
-[Ellman] You found him? -[Cutz] Either that or we scared him off.
translation.ko: - 놈을 찾았나? - 찾아냈거나 겁을 준 것 같습니다

translation.en: I ain't heard nothing for days, so I reckon it's over, boss.
translation.ko: 며칠째 아무 일도 없는 걸 보니 이제 끝난 모양입니다

translation.en: [Ellman] All right, I'll get a new delivery in. Go to the yard tonight to pick it up.
translation.ko: 좋아, 새로 배달책을 구하고 오늘 밤에 물건 가지러 와

translation.en: -We can't afford any more trouble. -Leave it to me, boss.
translation.ko: - 더는 차질이 있어선 안 돼 - 맡겨주십시오, 두목

translation.en: [chuckles] Got ya.
You're not leaving until you tell me exactly where you're going.
translation.ko: 정확히 어디로 가는지 말해주기 전에는 못 나갈 줄 알아

translation.en: I'm not a kid anymore. I don't have to tell you everything.
translation.ko: 전 어린애가 아니에요 뭐든 말씀드릴 필요 없다고요

translation.en: You know, I see your mom in you when I look at you.
-She was a junkie. -She was your mother.
And she was my daughter.
She made mistakes, but she was kind.
And she was good. She loved you.
She didn't know how to cope, and I should have been there for her.
translation.ko: 하지만 세상 사는 법을 몰랐고 나는 그 애 곁에 있어주지 못했어

translation.en: So, I will say to you what I wished I had said to her.
translation.ko: 그러니 그 애에게 못 해준 말을 네게 해주마

translation.en: I love you.
Come home.
Don't wait up.
[boy] Yay!
You all right, sweetheart? Looking for some business?
I got a tenner somewhere. Could do with a little sucky-suck.
Why don't you take that tenner and shove it up your ass, my darling?
I knew your granddad back in the day. We used to call him "The Pencil."
translation.ko: 네 할아버지를 알아 예전에 별명이 연필이었지 왜인지 알겠지?

translation.en: Shut up, man.
-Ms. Harvey. -Yeah, Danny, can I have a word?
translation.ko: - 하비 할머니 - 대니, 얘기 좀 할까?

translation.en: Tell me, have you noticed Tom behaving oddly recently?
[chuckles] He's always been odd, but...
translation.ko: 요새 톰이 이상하게 굴지 않아? 원래 별나긴 했지만...

translation.en: Yeah, he's been different since the accident.
-It wasn't an accident. -No, I suppose not.
But, yeah, he has changed. He...
He's angry, and I... I don't know what he's gonna do.
translation.ko: 톰은 화가 났어 무슨 짓을 저지를지 모르겠구나

translation.en: But I do know I don't want him to get hurt anymore,
so will you look out for him, Danny?
Yeah, yeah. Of course, I will, Ms. Harvey. I'll definitely do that.
translation.ko: - 그 애를 보살펴주겠니, 대니? - 네 당연히 그래야죠 꼭 지켜줄 거예요

translation.en: You're a good boy. Thanks.
Shit.
[man] The accident there that's left much of the A12 between Blackwall Tunnel and...
translation.ko: 영어권 국가 전반에 영향을 미친 사고는...

translation.en: [man] Use your weight to build power and follow through the strike.
Hit your opponent in the chest.
-Then find your opponent's weak spot... -[overlapping chatter continues]
Follow through the strike.
Get on him.
-Till he's dead! -Step him out!
Knock this shit out! [groans, shouts]
translation.ko: 그 악마가 무슨 짓을 한 거야?

translation.en: [man on TV] "At first, everything was perfect until I fell pregnant."
translation.ko: '처음에는 모든 게 완벽했는데 임신을 하게 됐죠'

translation.en: Tell me more, sweetheart, because you're the one I feel sorry for.
[woman] Well, when I got pregnant with my daughter,
everything started to get depressing.
It was hard at first. Then it started--
Lucy.
Nice of you to show up, Tom.
-I know. I'm... I'm sorry I wasn't there. -No, listen.
translation.ko: 내가... - 못 가서 미안해 - 잘 들어

translation.en: You said you would come with me. You said that.
translation.ko: 네 입으로 나랑 같이 가겠다고 했잖아

translation.en: -I know. I'm sorry. -Forget it.
Look, I'm sorry. I've been busy.
-I promise you, I'll make it up to you. -Busy?
I wish I could explain, but things have been...
-I haven't been myself. -No, seriously, Tom, just forget it.
translation.ko: - 내가 멀쩡한 상태가 아니었어 - 됐다니까, 잊어버려

translation.en: Cass, man.
I've known him since forever.
He was a dickhead, but...
Yeah.
So, what happened to you?
Oh, just... got jumped, that's all.
I haven't seen you around lately.
Been revising.
It's not what I've heard.
My cousin Tia says you haven't been in exams.
translation.ko: 내 사촌 티아 말이 네가 시험을 치지 않았다더라

translation.en: It's a shame, man.
I always thought you'd be the one to go places.
Who killed Cass, Danny?
If you ask me...
I blame that hacker.
He started shit that could only end one way.
-See you around, Tom. -See you around.
[woman crying] Let's cut him down. Take him from the balcony...
[girl] Everyone's saying it's iBOY.
translation.ko: - 정말 멋져 - 아이보이야 - 당신인 줄 알았는데 - 게이 같아

translation.en: Why don't you tell me a little bit about what's going on with you?
It's just-- this pain in my head-- I just-- I need the pieces--
translation.ko: 머리가 너무 아파요 어떻게든 전화 조각을 빼주세요

translation.en: You've gotta find some way-- I just--
-You need to operate. -Well, look--
Just take the pieces out of my fucking brain!
Hey, hey. Okay, okay.
There's not a lot that we can do about it.
translation.ko: 하지만 할 수 있는 일이 별로 없단다

translation.en: These fragments have moved a lot deeper into your brain tissue.
translation.ko: 이 조각들이 뇌 조직 속으로 더 깊이 들어가 버려서 안전하게 꺼낼 방법이...

translation.en: -There's just no safe way that we can-- -What if I pay you?
translation.ko: 더 깊이 들어가 버려서 안전하게 꺼낼 방법이... 제가 돈을 내면요?

translation.en: Well, then I'd be in private practice,
but I'm afraid I would still have to say no.
translation.ko: 그래도 안 된다고 말할 수밖에 없어

translation.en: You've got to help. Things haven't been the same since it's happened.
translation.ko: 도와주셔야 해요 사고 이후로 모든 게 변했다고요

translation.en: [sighs] Look...
Perhaps, I'm not the kind of doctor that you need to be talking to.
translation.ko: 네게 필요한 의사는 다른 과인지도 모르겠구나

translation.en: You're gonna need some more milk.
Hello, Wendy.
I've just been reading some of your stories.
You're a dark horse, aren't you?
Ellman, what the fuck are you doing here?
translation.ko: 엘먼, 너 같은 놈이 여기서 뭐 해?

translation.en: After all these years, can't we at least be civil?
You leave us alone, you fucking bastard!
-Nan! -Cutz.
Really? The granny?
[scoffs] Put her on the bed. Make sure she's breathing.
-Let me see her. -Don't worry, she'll be all right.
translation.ko: - 할머니를 보게 해줘 - 괜찮을 테니 걱정하지 마

translation.en: We'll keep an eye on her.
Cutz is a man with a hammer in a world of china. Know what I mean?
Keon, let him go.
-[chuckling] -You're gonna wish you hadn't done that.
Oh, yeah? What are you gonna fucking do, you little prick?
translation.ko: 그래? - 네까짓 게 뭘 어쩔 건데? - 커츠, 그만해

translation.en: Cutz, enough.
translation.ko: - 네까짓 게 뭘 어쩔 건데? - 커츠, 그만해

translation.en: I grew up in this tower block.
My bedroom looked out the same side as this.
-View's changed a bit. -What do you want?
translation.ko: - 전망은 좀 변했군 - 원하는 게 뭐지?

translation.en: To reminisce uninterrupted. Is that okay?
You see, back in the day, when I was in short trousers,
translation.ko: 내가 짧은 바지를 입던 어린 시절에는

translation.en: this whole area was a shit-hole.
Now, it's just us... in the shadow of millionaires.
How many lads from the estate
do you think make it up those skyscrapers, Tom?
We have different towers to climb, don't we?
So...
You called. Here I am. What did you want to say to me?
translation.ko: 난 네가 불러서 온 거야 내게 무슨 말을 하려고 했지?

translation.en: No? These moments are always better in our head, aren't they?
translation.ko: 말 안 해? 이런 순간은 상상할 때가 더 나은 법이지

translation.en: The French have a word for it.
translation.ko: 프랑스어로는 한 단어로 표현할 수 있는데

translation.en: But then they have a word for fucking everything.
-I wanted to hurt you. -Okay, good.
-Now, we're getting somewhere. -Not anymore.
-You're not worth it. It's over now. -It's pretty far from over, Tom.
translation.ko: 당신은 죽일 가치도 없으니까 복수는 끝났어 아직 끝나려면 멀었어, 톰

translation.en: You don't call the devil then get upset when he turns up.
You're not the devil. You're just a cunt.
I suppose I am a bit, yeah.
What was that?
What is it you're doing?
You've got a little look in your eye like you're busy.
Are you, Tom?
Are you busy little bee?
What you looking for?
Do you know?
I've heard rumors that you can tap into phones with just your mind.
translation.ko: 소문으로는 네가 머릿속에서 남들 전화를 들여다보고

translation.en: Break into bank accounts with the click of a finger.
translation.ko: 클릭 한 번으로 은행 계좌에 잠입한다던데

translation.en: -Sounds a bit far-fetched, doesn't it? -Yeah.
But do you know... I happen to think...
that it's true?
I wouldn't know anything about that.
[scoffs] Don't do that.
That's the difference between us and them.
They have a modicum of talent, they shout it from the rooftops.
translation.ko: 저들은 손톱만 한 재능만 있어도 지붕 위에서 외치며 자랑해

translation.en: Us? We have a talent, we get told to shut up.
translation.ko: 그런데 우리는 재능이 있으면 입 다물라는 소리를 듣지

translation.en: "Don't show off. Don't be such a clever bastard."
translation.ko: 과시하지 말라고 똑똑한 티 내지 말라고 하잖아

translation.en: You're special, Tom. Don't ever, ever pretend that you're not.
translation.ko: 넌 특별해, 톰 절대로 특별하지 않은 척하지 마

translation.en: All right, I'm special.
What's it got to do with you?
My one gift, if I may be so bold, is vision.
I want to help you fulfill your potential.
I want to give you the opportunity to change the world.
You mean the opportunity to make a lot of money.
-An obscene amount of money. -I'll pass.
-Why? -'Cause go fuck yourself, that's why.
Hey, hey, hey.
Okay.
Okay. Well...
It was worth a shot.
I've spent a lot of money bailing my boys out of police custody,
translation.ko: 네 덕분에 부하들 보석금으로 많은 재산을 날렸으니

translation.en: so you owe me.
Now, I want you to ask yourself one very important question.
translation.ko: 그럼 아주 중요한 질문을 해 봐

translation.en: "Where, oh, where is Lucy?"
You see her, don't you?
She's got nothing to do with any of this.
translation.ko: 루시는 이 일과 아무 관련 없어

translation.en: That's entirely up to you.
I don't like this.
Next time, get a note from your fucking mom or something.
-I can't kill no girl. -It ain't gonna come to that!
translation.ko: - 여자를 죽일 수 없다는 뜻이야 - 그럴 일은 없어

translation.en: -Yeah, what if it does? -I'm right here, you know.
translation.ko: - 만약 죽여야 하면? - 다 듣고 있거든

translation.en: Yeah, we see you.
What, just like you've seen me every fucking day since nursery?
translation.ko: 뭐? 유치원 때부터 하루도 안 빼놓고 본 주제에

translation.en: Does that mean nothing?
Come on, Ant.
We grew up together.
Our moms used to walk us home from school together.
translation.ko: 우리는 각자 엄마 손 잡고 나란히 하교했고

translation.en: We used to play in that little park by the estate?
-Fuck this, man! -Oi, gag her or something, Haz.
translation.ko: - 난 못 하겠어 - 쟤 입을 틀어막든지 해

translation.en: I can't listen to her shit anymore, man.
-So, how does it work, then? -I woke up with it after they shot me.
translation.ko: - 어떻게 그렇게 됐지? - 총에 맞고 깨어나니 이랬어

translation.en: -You get shot and you get super powers. -Yes.
-Most people just get dead. -Lucky, I guess.
That's yet to be established.
-So go on. Show me what you can do. -I won't steal for you.
translation.ko: - 그럼 네 능력을 보여줘 - 도둑질은 안 해

translation.en: I think you probably might, though.
You're gonna do what I say, or I'm gonna burn your world down.
translation.ko: 내가 시키는 대로 하지 않으면 이 주택단지를 불태워주지

translation.en: Danny, can you come in here, please?
It was young Daniel here who first suggested
you might be our masked man.
And do you know? He didn't even want to be here to see if he was right.
translation.ko: 자기 말이 맞는지 확인하러 여기 오려고 하지도 않았어

translation.en: -How long have you known Danny? -My whole life.
translation.ko: - 얼마나 오래 아는 사이지? - 평생 알아왔어

translation.en: Your whole life.
I've never even met the guy and yet, he gave you up to me.
translation.ko: 난 이 녀석을 본 적도 없는데 이 녀석은 널 내게 넘겼지

translation.en: Do you know why?
Little pictures of the Queen.
If you're gonna betray a friend, look him in the eye while you do it.
Little pictures of Elizabeth.
Open your mouth, Danny.
Open your fucking mouth.
In case you're wondering, that's what power looks like.
translation.ko: 한 수 가르쳐주자면 이게 힘이라는 거야

translation.en: Now...
You're gonna put funds into my bank account...
because I know you can do it,
and I know you're not gonna let me do the things I'm willing to do if you don't.
translation.ko: 네가 안 하겠다고 하면 내가 하게 될 일을 막고 싶겠지

translation.en: Give me your phone, Danny.
Now, fuck off.
Okay, none of us are getting any younger. Let's get this done.
translation.ko: 좋아, 기다려 봤자 좋을 게 없으니 어서 해치우자

translation.en: Be a dear and fill her up, will you?
Is that as fast as you can go?
I could just dump the entire Bank of England in there, but...
I think people might start asking questions.
You see, I still like this guy despite everything.
You're a special kid, Tom.
A special kid.
Looks like we're doing it.
I'm gonna put an X on it.
Yeah?
Whoever gets the X has got to do it. Put your hands out.
translation.ko: X를 뽑은 사람이 쏘는 거야 손바닥 내밀어

translation.en: Are you fucking kidding me?
-What'd you expect--? -Don't talk to her.
translation.ko: - 네가 무슨... - 쟤랑 말 섞지 마

translation.en: Well, I wouldn't shoot an unarmed girl tied to a chair.
translation.ko: 나라면 맨손으로 의자에 묶인 여자애를 쏘진 않겠어

translation.en: Shut up.
But I guess I'm not a big man like you, Eugene.
translation.ko: 하지만 난 너처럼 덩치 큰 남자는 아니지, 유진

translation.en: Shut up! Just shut the fuck up!
Why don't you just fucking do it, then? Isn't that what you want?
translation.ko: 그냥 쏘면 되잖아? 어차피 죽이려던 게 아니야?

translation.en: -Hey, yo, calm down, man. Come on, man. -Don't test me, man!
translation.ko: - 진정해, 총 내려놔 - 소리 지르지 마

translation.en: -Chill, mate! Chill, man! -Get the fuck off me!
-[overlapping chatter] -[siren wailing]
-Help! -Hurry up!
-Shut up. -[muffled screaming]
-We gotta fucking go, man! -Hurry up, man!
What just happened?
Nothing.
Cutz, check in with the warehouse.
Turn it off.
Fuck.
No answer, boss.
All right, let's take this on the road.
They're gone. Oi, they're gone.
[laughing] That was fucking close, bruv.
Oh, shit. You fucked up.
Tom... of the Crowley Estate Harpers.
I knew your mum back in the day. She was a good time girl.
translation.ko: 예전에 네 엄마를 알았어 헤픈 여자였지

translation.en: She could light up a room with her hand jobs.
You must have been, what, three when she died?
-Two. -Two?
I knew her well, you know.
Very well.
Gosh, you don't think...
We both certainly like getting into a lot of trouble, don't we?
translation.ko: 우리는 둘 다 문제에 휘말리는 걸 좋아하지

translation.en: I wasn't actually gonna kill you, Luce.
-No? -No, no, no, no, no.
Calm down.
I never used to think you could rape me... either, Eugene.
translation.ko: 난 너희가 날 강간할 줄은 몰랐어 유진마저도

translation.en: 'Cause we grew up together.
And we were friends, remember?
-What happened was fucked up, I admit-- -You don't get to talk about it!
Fuck you, Ant!
Fuck all of you!
Tell me you're ashamed.
-I'm ashamed. -Honestly, I'm ashamed.
-I'm ashamed. I swear that I'm ashamed. -No!
You're scared!
If you were ashamed, you wouldn't be able to even look at me.
translation.ko: 정말 부끄러우면 날 쳐다보지도 못할 텐데

translation.en: So, don't fucking look at me!
Get on your knees, all of you.
-Lucy, Lucy-- -Now!
-Lucy, you don't have to do this, please. -I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
translation.ko: - 당장 - 루시... - 루시, 제발 이러지 마 - 내가 잘못했어

translation.en: I don't know what happened to you.
Well...
I have to admit I was expecting you to be rather more restrained than this, young lady.
translation.ko: 솔직히 이보다는 더 몸을 사릴 줄 알았어

translation.en: Bravo.
Boys, can you come out here, please?
You haven't shot them, have you?
Oh, good.
Gentlemen, everything under control? Only, the hostage has got the gun.
translation.ko: 인질이 총을 가지고 있는 점만 제외하면, 다 순조로운 상황인가?

translation.en: -Lucy! -[both grunting]
Don't fucking move.
Tom?
Natural order is restored.
Come on, Tom, up you get.
By the way, I wanted to apologize personally for the indignities you had to suffer.
translation.ko: 네가 당한 모욕에 대해서는 개인적으로 사과하고 싶어

translation.en: Young people today...
Like animals, you know?
I wouldn't like me, either.
Continue.
Come on, Tom.
I'm trying.
A bit of performance anxiety?
Tom?
Come on!
If I gave you the option to walk away, would you take it?
translation.ko: 내가 달아날 기회를 준다면 받을 거야?

translation.en: What?
If I gave you the option to walk away and never come back, would you take it?
translation.ko: 달아나서 다시는 돌아오지 않을 기회를 주면 받아들일 거냐고?

translation.en: Why the fuck would I do that?
Just thought I'd ask first.
I've never been more fucking disappointed with anyone in my life.
translation.ko: 평생 사람에게 이보다 더 실망해본 적이 없어

translation.en: Maybe you're not that special after all.
translation.ko: 어쩌면 넌 전혀 특별하지 않은지도 모르지

translation.en: No, you are special...
But I'm still gonna kill ya!
Get the fuck away from him, you middle-aged prick!
translation.ko: 그 애한테서 떨어져 이 지긋지긋한 놈아

translation.en: Stupid little girl.
Back again, Nan?
Oh, Tommy.
Tom.
What do you want?
Here's the money Ellman gave me.
What I did was unforgivable. I know that.
translation.ko: 내가 저지른 짓을 용서받을 수 없다는 걸 알아

translation.en: I know we're done. I just wanted to do right by you.
translation.ko: 우리 사이가 끝났다는 것도 알지만 네게 사과하고 싶었어

translation.en: [scoffs] Why? 'Cause we were friends?
Or 'cause you're scared of me?
Keep it. I don't want it.
I reckon you did us all a favor, you know, taking him out.
translation.ko: 넌 우리에게 호의를 베풀었잖아 일부러 그자를 밖으로 끌어냈지

translation.en: I'm just saying, I know you're probably beating yourself up about it,
translation.ko: 너는 만신창이가 될 줄 알면서도 말이야

translation.en: but, guys like that, they gotta get got.
translation.ko: 하지만 그런 놈들은 호되게 당해야 해

translation.en: You know, Danny, I was thinking, I went after everyone in that video,
translation.ko: 대니, 난 그 비디오에 찍힌 사람 모두를 알아냈어

translation.en: but I didn't stop to think about who was filming.
Maybe you'll get him yet.
Peace, Tom.
Yo.
Give it to you down there.
Don't jump.
Unless you can fly now, too.
Is that another one of your magical powers?
translation.ko: 이제 날 수 있다면 또 모르지만

translation.en: -So, things got pretty mental back there. -People got hurt, Tom.
I know.
-I mean, I literally shot a guy. -I'm sorry, Lucy.
translation.ko: - 난 진짜로 사람을 쐈다고 - 미안해, 루시

translation.en: I'm trying to say I'm sorry.
All right.
I forgive you.
I see his face whenever I close my eyes.
I see a lot of faces when I close my eyes. I don't know if it ever really goes away.
translation.ko: 난 눈을 감으면 아주 많은 얼굴이 보이는걸 떨쳐낼 수 있을지 모르겠어

translation.en: But I'll help you if you help me.
translation.ko: 하지만 네가 날 도와주면 나도 널 도울게

translation.en: You know, there are restaurants in town.
People go and then other people cook for them. It's really great.
translation.ko: 먹으러 가면 다른 사람이 요리를 해준대 너도 먹으러 가 봐

translation.en: -You should try it. -[chuckles]
The view's pretty good, though.
So, are you gonna stick around, then?
In case you need me?
In case I want you.
